tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE printer_maintenance (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task VARCHAR(255),
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  issues TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  completion_date DATE,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT,
    frequency INT,
    last_completed_date DATE,
    next_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    reported_by TEXT,
    reported_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PrinterRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    printer_serial_number TEXT,
    maintenance_task_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(50),
  frequency INT,
  issue_encountered VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    printer_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    performed_by TEXT,
    performed_at TIMESTAMP,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    printer_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    reported_at TIMESTAMP
);
